entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High plus 3.
